name: Fire Brigade
description:
You are a firefighter who has sixty seconds to put out the fires in the building and hose down the arsonist behind them.

Put out the fires on each floor to allow you to use the staircase to go to the next floor. Put out all the fires to then be able to hose down the Arsonist on the final level.

  • Levels are procedurally generated
  • WASD or Arrow keys to move, SpaceBar to use the fire hose
  • See how little firehouse you can use to beat the game
  • See how quickly you can beat the game.
